mapper.select: select count(id) from exam_technology_day_exercise_submit where `right` = 0 and exercise_id = #{id}
select count(id) from exam_technology_day_exercise_submit where exercise_id = #{id}

select exam_technology_day_exercise_submit.*, exam_technology_day_exercise.title, exam_technology_day_exercise.standard_answer, exam_technology_day_exercise.analysis, exam_technology_day_exercise.Professional_id, exam_professional.professional_name, exam_technology_day_exercise.course_id, exam_course.course_name, exam_student.stu_name,exam_technology_day_exercise_submit.submit_date from exam_technology_day_exercise_submit left join exam_technology_day_exercise on exam_technology_day_exercise_submit.exercise_id = exam_technology_day_exercise.id join exam_professional on exam_technology_day_exercise.Professional_id = exam_professional.id join exam_course on exam_technology_day_exercise.course_id = exam_course.id join exam_student on exam_technology_day_exercise_submit.student_id = exam_student.id where exam_technology_day_exercise_submit.exercise_id=#{id}
